TopicTitle: Ask a question, then edit your post to make the answer seem funny.

Articles.Content:
Yes, provided you aren't insane and build a massive ship.

How hot does your computer get when you run KSP?

Edited February 19 by Kerb24

It's blasting 43°C.
If i were to judge the door on my left, what words would i have to say on my rant?
